channel.title: BCCANSCAPE 659! Great Server|Nice Owner|Peaceful Community|GE Coming Soon!
channel.description:
This Server Just Got Put Up Yesterday, and I am looking for players to come and join me in BCCANSCAPE.
This server is a fairly decent server, and i am adding penguins in about a week or so... Idk if this is correct but i heard penguins are popular in rsps's. (Correct me if im wrong). As far as staff... I am not hiring people right off the bat because i need players more than i need staff members. Once i have a decent amount of players, i start choosing staff by who has been a big help to the server.
ATM i have to have a downloadable client due to website issues. My webclient should be up and running in about a week or 2. here is the link to my downloadable client https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/84236205/BCCANSCAPE.jar Thanx :D. Sorry for the DL client, i just dont know any other way. :l My website is [url=http://Bccantech.net]Bccantech.net[/url] but dont bother clicking on bccanscape, it does not work as i described above. Webclient is here for now [url=http://www.bccanscape.webs.com]www.bccanscape.webs.com[/url] Thank you all who decide to give my server a try. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OuQIUVsprvQ[/youtube] [img]http://s15.postimg.org/sm3ts4ubf/img_1.jpg[/img] [img]http://s15.postimg.org/hb163rngb/img_2.jpg[/img] [img]http://s15.postimg.org/pht5vcdiz/Img_3.jpg[/img] [img]http://s15.postimg.org/ifztmvzaz/IMG_4.jpg[/img] [img]http://s15.postimg.org/hezkxribf/img_5.jpg[/img] [img]http://s16.postimg.org/flwpxfrrp/img6.jpg[/img]

off topic:

be actual relative to the domain name

going to log in and check to see how it is

edit: nevermind too glitchy…

item.description:
@xdx52 wrote:

This Server Just Got Put Up Yesterday, and I am looking for players to come and join me in BCCANSCAPE.

This server is a fairly decent server, and i am adding penguins in about a week or so… Idk if this is correct but i heard penguins are popular in rsps’s. (Correct me if im wrong).
As far as staff… I am not hiring people right off the bat because i need players more than i need staff members.
Once i have a decent amount of players, i start choosing staff by who has been a big help to the server.

ATM i have to have a downloadable client due to website issues. My webclient should be up and running in about a week or 2.
here is the link to my downloadable client https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/84236205/BCCANSCAPE.jar Thanx :D.
Sorry for the DL client, i just dont know any other way. :l
My website is Bccantech.net but dont bother clicking on bccanscape, it does not work as i described above.
Webclient is here for now www.bccanscape.webs.com
Thank you all who decide to give my server a try.
